Text.Page:
My arm...I think it's broken.

Turn back now. This place...no one can survive! My expedition made it only as far as the next room...and I ran when I realized it was hopeless. They're...they're all dead.

If you won't turn back, at least listen before you head into this Two-Ring Circus.

There are two levers on opposite sides of the chamber. You must flip both at the same time and fight both monsters, each in their separate arena. Both monsters must die at the same time if you're to proceed.

You'll...you'll need to split up.
